about_the_game:
The Gigachess original soundtrack is a set of moody, atmospheric tracks blending piano, strings and a sprinkle of chiptunes. The OST is provided through Steam as high-quality MP3s (320 kbps) and FLACs (16-bit), with each track featuring 2-3 seamless loops faithful to the music's in-game looping playback.

Total playtime: 19:46

Music by Trevor McAleese / Drixxel

name: Gigachess - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 48 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 119 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: High-quality audio delivered in FLAC format

short_description: The Gigachess OST is a set of moody, atmospheric tracks blending piano, strings and a sprinkle of chiptunes.
